item.description:
Are you ready for a new adventure with your kids? Are your kids participating in the Metrorock after-school climbing program? Did you ever want to give rock climbing a try yourself (or want to try it again)?

Well, now you and your kids can give rock climbing a try together. Join us for a Family Rock Climbing event on Sunday, February 7, at 2pm at Rock Spot Climbing (http://www.rockspotcl...) at 67 Sprague Street, Boston, MA.

Here's what you and your family get:
* $15 per participant, no charge for spectators
* costs includes climbing and gear rentals (harness, shoes)
* belay lesson for participants 14 years and older (all area rock climbing gyms require you to pass a belay test if you want to belay yourself)
* dedicated staff that will belay kids & parents

Rock Spot climbing is a dedicated climbing gym for both bouldering and belayed climbing. They also have a slackline for those that are good at balancing on ridiculously small ropes.
item.name: Family Rock Climbing
